text:
A Night of Chaos

A crowd gathers around a fallen man.  
“Did he fall or was he drunk?”  
“He screamed three times!”  
“Everyone heard it!”

---

Raskolnikov pushes through the crowd.  
“It’s Marmeladov! He needs help!”  
“I’ll pay! Hurry, please!”  
“Get a doctor now!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov recognizes the injured man, Marmeladov, and urgently insists on getting him medical help while offering to pay for it.
